Activity: Log in for a wrap-up week session, checking all documentation and marketing materials are finished.
Hold a feedback session with the team to discuss the completed work and gather insights.
Address any last comments on the documentation or marketing material received during the feedback session.
Finalize any loose ends in documentation and emails for the week.
Plan and organize tasks for the next week related to the project's continuation.
Wrap up the week, respond to any outstanding emails, and log off for the weekend.
